column2: Hill has an ankle injury and it is unknown as to if he will recover in time to play Week 1 against the Bears.
Collins has been issued a 10-game suspension for violating the NFL's Performance Enhancing Drugs policy but is expected to be available against the Buccaneers on November 26.
Fuller is on injured reserve with a torn ACL.

Powell has been suspended four games for violating the league's policy on performance-enhancing drugs and is recovering from a torn meniscus. He will likely be recovered from the knee injury by the end of September but will only be eligible to play Octobe
Ola is nursing an ankle injury and it is uncertain if he will be ready for the season opener against the Jets.
Taylor has been diagnosed with a concussion but is expected to play Week 1 against the Jets.
Worthy is dealing with a head injury and it is unknown if he will participate against the Jets during Week 1.
Williams is nursing a knee injury and his status for the season opener against the Jets is uncertain.

Henderson will miss the first five games of the season as part of a previous 10-game suspension for violating the league's substance abuse policy. He is expected to be available Week 7 against the Buccaneers.
Yates is going through the league-mandated concussion protocol and it is uncertain as to if he will be available against the Jets during Week 1.
Vallejo had his knee scoped and it is unclear as to if he will be ready for the season opener against the Jets.

Matthews has a chip fracture in his sternum but is expected to recover in time for the season opener against the Jets.

Johnson has landed on the injured reserve list as he underwent surgery to repair a back injury.

Ross is battling a left knee injury and it is unclear if he will make his season debut against the Ravens during Week 1.

Peerman has landed on injured reserve due to a shoulder injury.
Hill has an ankle injury and his availability for Week 1 against the Ravens is up in the air.
Williams has a dislocated elbow and is not expected to suit up against the Ravens on September 10.
